datafield.subfield: p.56 (Standard Chartered Bank; on 1st January 1985, The Standard Bank and The Chartered Bank formally adopted the name of their parent group, Standard Chartered; head office: 10 Clements Lane, Lombard Street, London EC4N 7AB)
AIM25 (Archives in London and the M25 area) website, viewed 31 Oct. 2014:

under Standard Chartered Bank (the Chartered Bank merged with the Standard Bank in 1969, creating the Standard Chartered Banking Group Limited; both banks continued to operate separately; on 1 October 1975 the name of the Group was changed to Standard Chartered Bank Limited; in 1983 all banking operations of both Standard Bank and Chartered Bank were brought together into one company, titled, Standard Chartered Bank; in 1985 the parent company [the Group] was renamed Standard Chartered PLC; following the 1969 merger the bank retained City of London headquarter premises at 10 Clements Lane (former headquarters of Standard Bank Limited) and at 38 Bishopsgate (former headquarters of Chartered Bank, until new premises were opened in Aldermanbury Square in 1990)
Standard Chartered plc website, viewed 31 Oct. 2014:
about p. (international banking group) contact p. (global headquarters: Standard Chartered Bank, 1 Basinghall Avenue, London EC2V 5DD, UK)
(Standard Chartered Bank; previous registered name: The Chartered Bank, until 4 Feb. 1985; ultimate parent: Standard Chartered PLC)
